Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone, I am creating a youtube series inspired by Macey Dean's Spiritwolf Saga. The Series takes place during the time that all of the Spiritwolf ships are heading to laythe. The revolves around a singe kerbal: Felix Kerman. Felix has a backstory that will be revealed later on in the series. Just before the first episode Felix builds a missile frigate with funding from HanLan. Felix believes Spiritwolf needs to be brought down so he joins the cause.

Here is the first episode of the series.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-iBrbyzkfec?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

After the video Felix heads back to the HanLan Station for refueling and rearming. And added some extra parts. 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B-UdyPfbyUg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

After the successful mission Felix heads back into Kerbin orbit and back to the station awaiting his next mission

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BgMlB9rt9Og?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Felix Kerman is send adrift. will help come and save him

Craft File Repository: [https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships](https://www./folder/zimh7hf7jobbn/UKNC_Ships)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-16T13:19:13Z" title="08/16/2015 01:19  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 16, 2015</time> by FTWG4M3RS**
